boost::logging::level::holder_compile_time< fix_level > Struct Template Reference

Detailed Description

template<int fix_level = debug>
struct boost::logging::level::holder_compile_time< fix_level >

Filter - holds the level - and tells you at compile time if a filter is enabled or not.

Fix (compile time) holder
